data.title: Electronic Arts Inc.
data.header: Electronic Arts Reports Q1 FY23 Financial Results
data.description: Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ: EA) today announced preliminary financial results for its first fiscal quarter ended June 30, 2022.

data.title: Electronic Arts Inc.
data.description: Having helped to complete the transition with our new CFO, Blake Jorgensen’s last day with Electronic Arts is today, July 29. We appreciate everything he has done for our company, and we wish him all the best.

data.title: Electronic Arts Inc.
data.header: An Update on Our Technology Teams
data.description: Technology is already at the center of every decision we make today, and as we look to the opportunities ahead of us, we want to weave it even more deeply into the fabric of how we operate.
